alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 8:39PM MDT until July 09 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Musselshell County in central Montana... Northeastern Golden Valley County in central Montana... * Until 930 PM MDT. * At 838 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 20 miles north of Ryegate, or 29 miles west of Roundup, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Musselshell and northeastern Golden Valley Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
